changelog.change: Changed behaviour of the embedded savefile resetter. The button will now automatically disable itself after resetting Colt's progression for 5 seconds. This should prevent a couple of crashings. If the new feature is borked, please report me.
Further refinements to the memory scanner
Fixed a memory pointer which caused issue in the last split. Thanks seeker for reporting this to me
Fixed the in-game timer not pausing during the so-called "double loading screen"
Fixed the Colt's campaign progression reset button, which crashed the game in some instances
Added a setting option to reset Colt's story progression. This avoid having to manually delete the savefile and restart the game when you reset a run. Use this setting with caution.
Added support for the latest game patch released on Oct 14th 2021
Little hotfix with LiveSplit sometimes not hooking the game memory correctly
Fixed a small oversight leading to LiveSplit crashing in certain scenarios
Fixed the timer staying paused in the menu while playing in offline mode.
Fixed the timer incorrectly autostarting then pausing the game in the first map.
Added autostart option for Final Loop speedrun category (default: disabled).
